doc.field: WTC Potential Human Remains (PHR) Recovery related: Site Specific Health & Safety Plans (drafts & final) for WTC Haul Road, Off-Site sifting in at 11 Water St in Brooklyn, pre-sifting operation at WTC 39th Street Pier, and exploratory excavations; draft plan to implement report recommendations for additional PHR searches at WTC. Tearsheets, web pages, memos, etc. (all 2006-07). CD of FDNY photos of WTC PHR Project. Final FDNY Recovery Team report (set of memos), June 10, 2002. Also files on investigation into 130 Liberty Street (Deutsche Bank/One Bankers Trust Plaza) firefighter fatal injury (Graffignino/Beddia: Vol 1 of Report plus incident action plan, pre-fire plan, etc. (2007). Logbook of manpower (WTC-related, but not clear as to exactly how), 2006-07.(Includes digital formats)
